name: Katawa shoujo style for 4channel
description:
A katawa shoujo style for 4channel. I just copypasted the regular 4chan one. All credit goes to https://userstyles.org/styles/59057/4chan-katawa-chan. Feel free to make an actual good version if you feel like it.

27/10/2019 Update:
Forgot to type when I first uploaded this, but the theme is pretty bright and will probably annoy your eyes. If you pair it with the "Tomorrow" style, it creates a cool contrast and is more friendly with your sight.
